item.description:
This is always a fun event.  We have consistently had over 200 people attending!

Spend the afternoon in Boston, then join us in the evening for live music and dancing on the harbor cruise!  Boat returns at midnight.

The 8th annual No Alibi cruise tickets can now be ordered online and paid by credit card!

Tickets are available online or directly from Mark "Amadeus".

Tickets are $35, $30 if you order before July 4th.  Tickets can be ordered at the following link...

http://www.noalibirocks.com/cruisetix8.htm

There is no host for this event (volunteers welcome) but do feel free to grab some friends and come into Boston for this fun occasion.  There will be lots of people on the boat to meet!
item.name: 8th Annual Boston Harbor Cruise
